title: Topic 001 Question 138
body: You deploy a tabular model named DM1 to a Power BI Premium capacity. DM1 was created as an import model.
You change a fact table named Table1 into a hybrid table.
What else occurred on DM1 automatically after the change?
options: Table1 was removed from the scheduled refresh.
Dimension tables that relate to Table1 were changed to dual storage mode.
A related aggregation table was created.
A DirectQuery partition was added to Table1.
